job_description:
Responsibilities: Company Name: Icon Petroleum Corporation BD Brand: Icon Lubricant Icon Petroleum Corporation BD is hiring skilled and experienced personnel for the position of Area Sales Manager (A.S.M) in various districts of the country. Interested and qualified candidates are encouraged to apply. ЁЯФ╣ Job Details Position: Area Sales Manager (A.S.M) Number of Positions: 40 Job Type: Full-time Workplace: All districts of Bangladesh (Field-based in respective sub-districts/districts) Office Location: Bank Colony, Savar, Dhaka ЁЯФ╣ Responsibilities Hiring dealers and expanding dealer network in the assigned area as per company directives Regular visits to lubricant retailers, service centers, and potential customers Presentation of brand and product information in detail Working in the field from Saturday to Thursday, 10 AM to 8 PM (Break from 1 PM to 2:30 PM for prayer and lunch) Friday off Achieving daily/weekly/monthly sales targets (Monthly target: 1 million BDT) Working closely with dealer salesmen in the field to ensure sales growth Maintaining good relationships with dealers and ensuring regular orders Working in market expansion following company policies ЁЯФ╣ Qualifications and Experience Educational Qualification: Degree/Graduate/Honors or equivalent Age: 25 - 35 years Minimum 3-5 years of practical experience in sales and marketing Prior experience of at least 1 year in a lubricant company is preferred No need for fresh candidates to apply Must have leadership qualities, effective communication skills, and a goal-oriented work mentality ЁЯФ╣ Salary and Benefits Salary: 24,500 BDT T.A/D.A: 5,200 BDT Mobile Bill: 300 BDT Total: 30,000 BDT 1% incentive for achieving 75% sales achievement (up to 1 lakh BDT) Monthly earning opportunity of 30,000 - 50,000 BDT for working responsibly Career advancement opportunities based on performance ЁЯУЮ Contact Admin Icon Petroleum Corporation BD WhatsApp: 01901463326

ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржирж╛ржо: Icon Petroleum Corporation BD ржмрзНрж░рзНржпрж╛ржирзНржб: Icon Lubricant Icon Petroleum Corporation BD ржжрзЗрж╢рзЗрж░ ржмрж┐ржнрж┐ржирзНржи ржЬрзЗрж▓рж╛ржпрж╝ ржПрж░рж┐ржпрж╝рж╛ рж╕рзЗрж▓рж╕ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬрж╛рж░ (A.S.M) ржкржжрзЗ ржжржХрзНрж╖ ржУ ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮ ржЬржиржмрж▓ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЛржЧ ржжрж┐ржЪрзНржЫрзЗред ржЖржЧрзНрж░рж╣рзА ржУ ржпрзЛржЧрзНржп ржкрзНрж░рж╛рж░рзНржерзАржжрзЗрж░ ржирж┐ржХржЯ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржЖржмрзЗржжржи ржЖрж╣рзНржмрж╛ржи ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣ржЪрзНржЫрзЗред ЁЯФ╣ ржкржжрзЗрж░ рждржерзНржп ржкржжржмрзА: ржПрж░рж┐ржпрж╝рж╛ рж╕рзЗрж▓рж╕ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬрж╛рж░ (A.S.M) ржкржжрзЗрж░ рж╕ржВржЦрзНржпрж╛: рзкрзж ржЬржи ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐рж░ ржзрж░ржи: ржкрзВрж░рзНржгржХрж╛рж▓рзАржи ржХрж░рзНржорж╕рзНржерж▓: ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ржжрзЗрж╢рзЗрж░ рж╕ржХрж▓ ржЬрзЗрж▓рж╛ (ржирж┐ржЬ ржирж┐ржЬ ржЙржкржЬрзЗрж▓рж╛/ржЬрзЗрж▓рж╛ ржнрж┐рждрзНрждрж┐ржХ ржлрж┐рж▓рзНржб) ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ рж▓рзЛржХрзЗрж╢ржи: ржмрзНржпрж╛ржВржХ ржХрж▓рзЛржирзА, рж╕рж╛ржнрж╛рж░, ржврж╛ржХрж╛ ЁЯФ╣ ржжрж╛ржпрж╝рж┐рждрзНржм ржУ ржХрж░рзНрждржмрзНржп ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрзЗрж╢ржирж╛ ржЕржирзБржпрж╛ржпрж╝рзА ржирж┐ржЬ ржПрж▓рж╛ржХрж╛ржпрж╝ ржбрж┐рж▓рж╛рж░ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЛржЧ ржУ ржбрж┐рж▓рж╛рж░ ржирзЗржЯржУржпрж╝рж╛рж░рзНржХ рж╕ржорзНржкрзНрж░рж╕рж╛рж░ржг ржХрж░рж╛ рж▓рзБржмрзНрж░рж┐ржХрзЗржирзНржЯ ржмрж┐ржХрзНрж░рзЗрждрж╛ ржжрзЛржХрж╛ржи, рж╕рж╛рж░рзНржнрж┐рж╕ рж╕рзЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ ржУ рж╕ржорзНржнрж╛ржмрзНржп ржЧрзНрж░рж╛рж╣ржХ ржирж┐ржпрж╝ржорж┐ржд ржнрж┐ржЬрж┐ржЯ ржХрж░рж╛ ржмрзНрж░рзНржпрж╛ржирзНржб ржУ ржкржгрзНржпрзЗрж░ рждржерзНржп ржмрж┐рж╕рзНрждрж╛рж░рж┐рждржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржЙржкрж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржи ржХрж░рж╛ рж╢ржирж┐ржмрж╛рж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржмрзГрж╣рж╕рзНржкрждрж┐ржмрж╛рж░ рж╕ржХрж╛рж▓ рззрзжржЯрж╛ тАУ рж░рж╛ржд рзоржЯрж╛ ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНржд ржлрж┐рж▓рзНржбрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛ (ржжрзБржкрзБрж░ рззржЯрж╛ тАУ рзи:рзйрзжржЯрж╛ ржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬ ржУ ржЦрж╛ржмрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржмрж┐рж░рждрж┐) рж╢рзБржХрзНрж░ржмрж╛рж░ рж╕рж╛ржкрзНрждрж╛рж╣рж┐ржХ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржжрзИржирж┐ржХ/рж╕рж╛ржкрзНрждрж╛рж╣рж┐ржХ/ржорж╛рж╕рж┐ржХ рж╕рзЗрж▓рж╕ ржЯрж╛рж░рзНржЧрзЗржЯ ржкрзВрж░ржг ржХрж░рж╛ (ржорж╛рж╕рж┐ржХ ржЯрж╛рж░рзНржЧрзЗржЯ: рззрзж рж▓ржХрзНрж╖ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛) ржбрж┐рж▓рж╛рж░рзЗрж░ рж╕рзЗрж▓рж╕ржорзНржпрж╛ржиржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржорж╛ржа ржмржЬрж╛ржпрж╝ рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛ ржУ ржирж┐ржпрж╝ржорж┐ржд ржЕрж░рзНржбрж╛рж░ ржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрж┐ржд ржХрж░рж╛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржирж┐ржпрж╝ржоржирзАрждрж┐ ржЕржирзБрж╕рж░ржг ржХрж░рзЗ ржм

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities:
- Regular work with MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and other office software
- Data entry, data updating, and data storage as required by the office
- Typing and preparing various reports, letters, and official documents
- Checking emails, sending necessary emails, and maintaining records
- Properly managing office files and document archiving
- Completing tasks related to printing, scanning, photocopying, and online form filling
- Ensuring general maintenance and monitoring of office computers and related equipment
- Performing other office-related tasks as directed by the authorities

Requirements: Minimum HSC / equivalent pass Candidates with a diploma or training in computer operation will be given preference

ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржжрж╛рзЯрж┐рждрзНржм (Job Responsibilities): MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint ржПржмржВ ржЕржирзНржпрж╛ржирзНржп ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ рж╕ржлржЯржУрзЯрзНржпрж╛рж░рзЗ ржирж┐рзЯржорж┐ржд ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржирзАрзЯ ржбрж╛ржЯрж╛ ржПржирзНржЯрзНрж░рж┐, ржбрж╛ржЯрж╛ ржЖржкржбрзЗржЯ ржПржмржВ ржбрж╛ржЯрж╛ рж╕ржВрж░ржХрзНрж╖ржг ржХрж░рж╛ ржмрж┐ржнрж┐ржирзНржи рж░рж┐ржкрзЛрж░рзНржЯ, ржЪрж┐ржарж┐ржкрждрзНрж░ ржУ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рж┐рзЯрж╛рж▓ ржбржХрзБржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржЯрж╛ржЗржк ржУ ржкрзНрж░рж╕рзНрждрзБржд ржХрж░рж╛ ржЗ-ржорзЗржЗрж▓ ржЪрзЗржХ ржХрж░рж╛, ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржирзАрзЯ ржЗ-ржорзЗржЗрж▓ ржкрж╛ржарж╛ржирзЛ ржПржмржВ рж░рзЗржХрж░рзНржб рж╕ржВрж░ржХрзНрж╖ржг ржХрж░рж╛ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ ржлрж╛ржЗрж▓ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржУ ржбржХрзБржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржЖрж░рзНржХрж╛ржЗржнрж┐ржВ рж╕ржарж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржкрж░рж┐ржЪрж╛рж▓ржирж╛ ржХрж░рж╛ ржкрзНрж░рж┐ржирзНржЯ, рж╕рзНржХрзНржпрж╛ржи, ржлржЯрзЛржХржкрж┐ ржПржмржВ ржЕржирж▓рж╛ржЗржи ржлрж░рзНржо ржкрзВрж░ржгрзЗрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ рж╕ржорзНржкржирзНржи ржХрж░рж╛ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ ржХржорзНржкрж┐ржЙржЯрж╛рж░ ржУ рж╕ржВрж╢рзНрж▓рж┐рж╖рзНржЯ ржпржирзНрждрзНрж░ржкрж╛рждрж┐рж░ рж╕рж╛ржзрж╛рж░ржг рж░ржХрзНрж╖ржгрж╛ржмрзЗржХрзНрж╖ржг ржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрж┐ржд ржХрж░рж╛ ржХрж░рзНрждрзГржкржХрзНрж╖рзЗрж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрзЗрж╢ржирж╛ ржЕржирзБржпрж╛рзЯрзА ржЕржирзНржпрж╛ржирзНржп ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ рж╕ржВржХрзНрж░рж╛ржирзНржд ржХрж╛ржЬ рж╕ржорзНржкрж╛ржжржи ржХрж░рж╛

Responsibilities: Design graphics for social media, websites & ads. Create marketing materials (banners, posters, brochures). Ensure brand consistency in all visuals. Collaborate with content & marketing teams. Prepare design files for web & print. Understanding the customer before finishing the design

Design graphics for social media, websites & ads. Create marketing materials (banners, posters, brochures). Ensure brand consistency in all visuals. Collaborate with content & marketing teams. Prepare design files for web & print. Understanding the customer before the finishing the design

Responsibilities: Need to handle incoming calls from potential customers related to the Client's business. Must provide excellent customer service and offer accurate information to customers, ensuring their satisfaction. Identify customer needs, clarify information, and provide solutions. Actively engage in every call to resolve the client's issues. Should have knowledge about Facebook (Social media), email, and web chat. Refer unresolved customer complaints to designated individuals for further investigation. Collect and review all relevant information to evaluate the validity of complaints and identify potential causes. Regularly report to the team leader regarding complex issues.

Requirements: Education Bachelor/Honors (Running) Diploma Completed Higher Secondary Completed Additional Requirements Knowledgeable about Social media, email & web chat. Basic Computer

Need to handle incoming calls to the prospective customers pertaining to the Client`s business. Need to provide excellent customer service and gives precise information to the customer, ensuring customer satisfaction. Identify customer needs, clarify information and provide solutions. Perform every call actively to solve client`s problem. Must be knowledgeable about Facebook (Social media), email & web chat. Refer unresolved customer grievances to designated persons for further investigation. Obtain and examine all relevant information in order to assess the validity of complaints and to determine possible causes. Report time to time to the team leader for complicated issues.

Responsibilities: - Collect blood samples safely (as per clinic protocol) and label samples correctly.
- Perform routine laboratory tests: CBC, biochemistry and other in-house tests as required.
- Operate lab equipment/analyzers (as available in the clinic) and ensure proper handling.
- Maintain cleanliness and biosafety of lab area; follow infection control and waste disposal rules.
- Prepare slides/smears (when needed) and assist in basic microscopic examination under supervision.
- Record test details properly and report results to the doctor/management on time.
- Store reagents/kits properly, monitor expiry dates, and maintain basic inventory.
- Assist with QC/maintenance tasks (daily cleaning, calibration support, logbook updates).
- Support the clinic team during busy hours and handle tasks responsibly.

Requirements: Education Diploma in Medical Technology (Laboratory) preferred (Candidates with relevant science background and lab experience may also apply.) Experience 0тАУ2 years experience in a diagnostic lab/veterinary clinic is preferred. Freshers can apply if confident to learn and work responsibly. Skills & Knowledge Basic knowledge of blood sample collection , labeling, and safe handling. Ability to operate CBC/biochemistry analyzers (training will be provided if needed). Understanding of biosafety, infection control, and waste disposal procedures. Basic computer skills for record keeping/report entry. Personal Requirements Honest, punctual, and responsible. Good communication and teamwork attitude. Willing to work 9 hours daily and handle workload during busy hours. Education Qualifications Diploma in Medical Technology (Laboratory) preferred (Candidates with relevant science background and lab experience may also apply.) Experience 0-2 years of experience in a diagnostic lab/veterinary clinic is preferred. Freshers can also apply - if eager to learn and responsible. Skills Basic understanding of blood sample collection , labeling, and safe handling. Ability to operate CBC/biochemistry analyzers (training will be provided if necessary). Knowledge of biosafety, infection control, and waste disposal procedures. Basic computer skills for record keeping/report entry. Personal Qualities Honest, punctual, and responsible. Good communication and teamwork skills. Mentally prepared to work 9 hours daily and manage workload during busy times.

ржжрж╛рзЯрж┐рждрзНржмрж╕ржорзВрж╣ ржХрзНрж▓рж┐ржирж┐ржХрзЗрж░ ржирж┐рзЯржо ржЕржирзБржпрж╛рзЯрзА ржирж┐рж░рж╛ржкржжржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж░ржХрзНржд рж╕ржВржЧрзНрж░рж╣ ржХрж░рж╛ ржПржмржВ рж╕ржарж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж▓рзЗржмрзЗрж▓рж┐ржВ ржХрж░рж╛ред рж░рзБржЯрж┐ржи рж▓рзНржпрж╛ржм ржЯрзЗрж╕рзНржЯ ржХрж░рж╛: CBC, Biochemistry ржПржмржВ ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржи ржЕржирзБржпрж╛рзЯрзА ржЕржирзНржпрж╛ржирзНржп ржЗржи-рж╣рж╛ржЙрж╕ ржЯрзЗрж╕рзНржЯред ржХрзНрж▓рж┐ржирж┐ржХрзЗ ржерж╛ржХрж╛ рж▓рзНржпрж╛ржм ржорзЗрж╢рж┐ржи/ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржирж╛рж▓рж╛ржЗржЬрж╛рж░ ржЕржкрж╛рж░рзЗржЯ ржХрж░рж╛ ржПржмржВ рж╕ржарж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрж┐ржд ржХрж░рж╛ред рж▓рзНржпрж╛ржм ржПрж░рж┐рзЯрж╛ ржкрж░рж┐рж╖рзНржХрж╛рж░ рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛, ржмрж╛рзЯрзЛрж╕рзЗржлржЯрж┐ ржорзЗржирзЗ ржЪрж▓рж╛ ржПржмржВ ржорзЗржбрж┐ржХрзЗрж▓ ржУрзЯрзЗрж╕рзНржЯ ржбрж┐рж╕ржкрзЛржЬрж╛рж▓ ржирж┐рзЯржо ржЕржирзБрж╕рж░ржг ржХрж░рж╛ред ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржи рж╣рж▓рзЗ рж╕рзНржорж┐рзЯрж╛рж░/рж╕рзНрж▓рж╛ржЗржб ржкрзНрж░рж╕рзНрждрзБржд ржХрж░рж╛ ржПржмржВ ржбрж╛ржХрзНрждрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ рждрждрзНрждрзНржмрж╛ржмржзрж╛ржирзЗ ржмрзЗрж╕рж┐ржХ ржорж╛ржЗржХрзНрж░рзЛрж╕рзНржХржкрж┐ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗ рж╕рж╣рж╛рзЯрждрж╛ ржХрж░рж╛ред ржЯрзЗрж╕рзНржЯ рж░рзЗржХрж░рзНржб ржарж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛ ржПржмржВ рж╕ржорзЯржорждрзЛ ржбрж╛ржХрзНрждрж╛рж░/ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯржХрзЗ рж░рж┐ржкрзЛрж░рзНржЯ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ред рж░рж┐ржПржЬрзЗржирзНржЯ/ржХрж┐ржЯ рж╕ржарж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж╕ржВрж░ржХрзНрж╖ржг, ржПржХрзНрж╕ржкрж╛рзЯрж╛рж░рж┐ ржоржирж┐ржЯрж░ , ржПржмржВ ржмрзЗрж╕рж┐ржХ ржЗржиржнрзЗржирзНржЯрж░рж┐ ржорзЗржЗржиржЯрзЗржЗржи ржХрж░рж╛ред Q

Responsibilities: In domestic and foreign Chinese and Indian projects, security guards will be hired in significant numbers to ensure the security and surveillance of mills, industries, factories, houses, showrooms, banks, and ATM booths.

Requirements: No security deposit or experience required here Other facilities: Free accommodation. Bonus salary given by the 10th of each month. Adequate overtime benefits available. Free medical treatment, two festival bonuses per year. Attendance bonus equivalent to one day's attendance. Salary will increase in the first 6 months and annually thereafter. Contact: 01932503955

Responsibilities: Are you hardworking? Do you want to eliminate unemployment? Then an extraordinary opportunity awaits you!

With over 155 years of experience, operating in more than 40 countries worldwide, and holding a prominent position in Bangladesh for over 70 years, American financial organization MetLife offers a golden opportunity to build a career as a Financial Associate.

Responsibilities:

- Finding new customers and establishing communication with them
- Creating appropriate insurance and savings plans based on the customer's income source, future plans, and preferences
- Regularly following up with existing customers and ensuring their satisfaction
- Providing correct guidance on financial security and investment plans for customers
- Achieving monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets
- Managing marketing activities to enhance brand value
- Building long-term relationships with customers and providing financial solutions for their families
- Actively participating in company training, workshops, and developmental programs

Requirements: Minimum HSC pass Preference will be given if you have a background in business, management, or marketing Experience in sales/marketing/finance sector will be preferred Freshers can also apply Age 25 years or above Must have excellent communication skills and presentation abilities Must have a mindset for goal-oriented work Must be self-confident, hardworking, and capable of accepting challenges Benefits:- Attractive salary (twice a month) тЬЕ Minimum of 3 bonuses per year тЬЕ Provident fund тЬЕ Medical facilities тЬЕ Pension benefits тЬЕ International educational trips every year тЬЕ Local trips тЬЕ Award nights with life partners тЬЕ Annual forest retreat with family тЬЕ Company insurance coverage тЬЕ Rapid promotion based on performance (opportunity to become Unit Manager and later Branch Manager) тЬЕ Opportunity to run your own agency тЬЕ Work autonomy based on your convenient time If you are ready to take on challenges and want to advance in a successful career path, then join our team today! Contact: Hossain Agency MetLife, Bangladesh Address: Lift-07, Sonartori Tower, Banglamotor, Dhaka-1000 Phone: 01935-901659 Stay with us, contribute to the country's service, fulfill your own dreams. Apply now!

Responsibilities: Organization Name: CT Group Position: Receptionist / Front Desk Executive Location: House 5, Block G, Main Road, Banasree, Rampura, Dhaka Salary: 15,000 - 18,000 Taka Duty Hours: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Weekly Holiday: Friday Responsibilities: Inform incoming guests politely and professionally Receive phone calls and transfer to the relevant department Manage front desk related tasks efficiently Assist in general administrative tasks as needed in the office Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the reception area Qualifications: SSC / HSC (Graduates preferred) Proficiency in Bengali and English communication Basic knowledge of computers (MS Word, Excel, Email) Punctual, responsible, and presentable personality Application Process: Interested candidates are requested to apply with an updated CV.

Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled Web Developer (Laravel) with a minimum of 2 years of professional experience in developing robust, scalable web applications. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance backend and web solutions using the Laravel framework, ensuring smooth integration with frontend components, databases, and third-party services.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications using the Laravel (PHP) framework.
- Write clean, secure, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and Laravel standards.
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers, product managers, and frontend developers to implement new features.
- Design and integrate RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.
- Ensure application performance, security, scalability, and reliability.
- Work with databases such as MySQL / PostgreSQL, including query optimization.
- Debug, troubleshoot, and fix application issues; continuously improve system performance.
- Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control.
- Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain coding standards.
- Stay up to date with the latest Laravel, PHP, and web development trends.

Requirements: - Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computing & Information System
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computing & Information System
